runs.comm: bang on target, just on the offstump and Smith pushes it softly to the off side and tells Kallis to stay put
once again, cramps him for room and he settles for a push down the pitch, claps resonate around The Oval
shuffles at his crease to try something different but he only succeeds in tucking it back to him, the bowler charges forward and under arms the ball on the stumps
appeal! wanders a bit across the stumps and the ball may have pitched a fraction outside leg, it was a skiddy full delivery, umpire Saheba shakes his head but it was a good shout
poor line and you cannot bowl there to Smith especially with the fine leg up, he tucks a full delivery wide of the fielder, forget about chasing it
much better, drops it a fraction shorter and he gets across and taps it down the pitch
the keeper is upto the stumps, he opens the face and dabs it softly to third man
bowls stump to stump and Smith can only steer it softly to backward point
waits for the ball to come onto him before tucking it straight to midwicket, not much pace on the ball
tucks it off his hip to short square leg and sets off initially and darts back
moves across his stumps and forces it away to deep square-leg
the bowler gets away a little, it was wide and slightly short but Kallis chose to push that to third man, he ought to have slammed that somewhere
classical off drive, he leans into a half volley outside off, gets behind the line and just pushes it past the big gap between mid-off and the covers
not bowling to his field, he strays on the body and Kallis gets a slight shuffle across and clips that past square leg, no sweeper out in the deep
stops on him a bit but he checks his drive to mid-off
slightly shorter and cramps him for room, he opens the face and softly dabs it to third man
goes for an expansive drive but mistimes it to mid-on
bowls the slower ball and drops it really short, Smith doesn't pick it well and he swishes across the line and misses it completely
lands it outside off and Kallis plays an ambitious off drive but the ball catches the outside edge and zooms past the keeper, no slip
gets behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler
another outside edge and it beats the keeper, third man is a lot finer this time
grants him width and he reaches out to angle it away to third man
nice stump to stump line again, Smith settles for another soft push down the pitch
drops it a bit too short, it's too easy for Smith who swivels at the crease and pulls high over square leg, no blue shirts there to cut it off
christmas comes early for Kallis, short and too wide from the bowler, Kallis reaches out and scoops it over backward point and it's a front foot no-ball too
Free Hit Dropped by the fielder at short extra cover but it doesn't matter, he tries to cup it over his head but spills the catch
strays on the pads and he shuffles slightly and nudges it on its way to fine leg, the keeper is up to the stumps
drops it short and it's wide too, he reaches out, rolls his wrists and cuts past backward point, third man cannot cut it off
he's having a ball here, this one is fuller and he bends his knee and drives hard past cover point, this was hit with more conviction

oh boy and we have a mifield, Kallis drives hard to cover point but the ball slips past the fielder, third man pulls it back before the rope but the ball spins back and there's yet another desperate attempt to pull it back
gets forward and defends back to the bowler
lovely straight drive, he gets behind the line and pushes it past the bowler and mid-on
steers it square of the wicket on the off side
half hearted pull but he places it just wide of mid-on
tries to cheekily dab it down to third man but the ball kicks up a bit more and beats the outside edge
turns it towards midwicket and they attempt a single but Smith rushes back to his end
that's very very sloppy! The bug's spreading really fast, Smith harmlessly pushes it down to mid-on and the ball slips right between Macleod's legs and runs away
works it away behind square on the on side
gives it a bit of air and Smith chips it high and hard over wide midwicket, his placement is so precise that both fielders patrolling the deep couldn't get to it
beware of Smith! The arm ball is dished out wide outside off and Smith fetches it and slogs him across the line and nearly sends it over the rope at wide long-on
this one skids through and beats the outside edge
cramps him for room and skids through, nearly shaves the stumps
gets a bit of late turn, he gets behind the line and defends
pushes it to the offside
floated on the pads and he gets on his knee and plays a forceful sweep to deep square-leg
gets on his knee early and sweeps to the on side
goes for an expansive drive and he gets a thick inside edge to his boot, Kallis is in a bit of pain
forces it down to midwicket
floated on the pads and he works it wide of midwicket
Dropped Kallis gets a leading edge to short extra cover and Hamilton actually hung on to it for a few second when diving to his right but the ball slipped out as his elbow hit the turf
just takes a few paces down the track and chips him high in the air with minimum follow through but there was enough power to carry it over the deep midwicket rope
makes a bit of room and taps it square on the off side
clips him wide of square leg and there's another fumble at the deep
gets nice turn from outside leg, he stays back and clips it against the turn to the on side
comes down the pitch and forces it down to wide mid-on
slow through the air and shorter, he makes room and slams it to sweeper cover

he gives it a lot of air outside off and tempts Kallis to go for the hoick on his knees, a little too ambitious in the end as he gets a thick inside edge onto his stumps, he looked set for a fifty but it's been a quality innings
slow through the air, he clips it down to square leg
keeps it slow, Smith gets forward and smothers the spin

a double-wicket over! Smith attempts a shot very similar to his opening partner, he gets on his knee for a slog sweep but gets a thick top edge and the keeper Smith jogs to his right and takes the easiest of catches
gets a leading edge to cover
makes room and he cuts to backward point
lunges forward and softly steers it to the packed off side field but still takes the single

plays an exquisite extra cover drive and the ball darts quickly towards the rope and MacLeod makes an excellent attempt at the rope, he gets hold of the ball but the momentum pushes it towards the rope, the third umpire takes a look
gives it a big toss up and de Villiers decides to stay at the crease and force it back to the bowler
turned towards mid-on
gives it a lot of air, he premeditates the shot by stepping down the pitch and carting the ball just over wide long-on, flat six
gets forward and drives to long-on
gets on his knee and slogs again but he finds the fielder
outside off and he softly steers him down to backward point
drops it short and he thumps it ton deep square-leg
gets forward and drives to wide long-on
comes round the wicket and drops it short on seeing Gibbs advance, he adjusts by checking his shot and dabbing it to third man
full on the pads and clipped to the on side
makes room and cuts to point
drops it short and he pummels it past square leg, the fielder in the deep manages to intercept it
chips it high over midwicket but it's a safe shot
gets forward and drives to Poonia at deep cover
Haq suddenly stops at the crease, waits for a second and then rolls his arm over, interesting tactic, the batsman pushes it to mid-on
stops at the crease and de Villiers thumps a low full toss down to long-off, the ball drops in front of the fielder
it's a low full toss and he crashes it past backward point
drops it short and he swivels and pulls to deep midwicket
chips down, checks his shot on seeing the shorter length and pushes it down to sweeper cover
another wicket falls to the offspinner, he gives it a lot of air and Gibbs dances down the pitch and fails to get behind the line, easy stumping for Smith, Watson was bowling round the wicket
pushes a full delivery to the off side
tucks it close to the pads to the spaces deep of square leg, Morkel doesn't want the second
stays at the crease and clips him to mid-on
too wide down the leg side and he doesn't offer a shot
thumps a short delivery and Watson at mid-off tries his best to get down and stop it, that hurt his fingers
makes room and cuts to sweeper cover
it's a front foot no ball, nice delivery all the same as the flight foxes the batsman, the ball clips the pads and goes past the keeper
Free Hit Fires it flat and quick and Morkel goes for the slog too early and gets an inside edge to his pads
all grace, He makes a bit of room and scoops it nonchalantly over extra cover, he didn't try to get too much power on the shot
comes down the pitch and clubs a full toss over midwicket
flighted outside off, he chips down the track and lofts him through the line over long-off
squeezes it just wide of mid-on and risks the single, the throw is just wide of the stumps at the bowler's end
take that! He gets on his knee to a flighted delivery and slogs him several rows back over deep midwicket
all brute force! He bowls it a bit flatter and quicker bit it doesn't help as he gets on his knee and whacks it past wide long-on
makes room and thumps it past cover
almost out of here! Takes a pace down the track, bends his knee and carts him several miles over deep midwicket, the crowd better take cover
he bowls it fuller outside off but de Villiers gets a lot of power on the shot as he squeezes it past backward point and beats sweeper cover
very costly full toss indeed! Comes close to the waist height and de Villiers stays at the crease and clubs it over long-on, nice catch by the spectator
He bowls a low full toss but Morkel fails to get completely underneath it, the ball spoons off the toe of the bat and lands down long-off's throat
makes room and squirts a full delivery down to extra cover
gets beside the line and cuts just wide of cover point
full on the blockhole outside off, he reaches out and squirts it to the off side
brings up his fifty in style! He drags his back leg across the crease, makes room and crashes it past the bowler and mid-on
stand and deliver! Gets underneath the bounce and scoops him very elegantly over his head, long-off had no chance
mis-hits a pull but the ball drops in the wide open spaces on the on side
full outside off and squeezed past extra cover
fullish on the pads and clipped wide of midwicket

one of the most stunning catches you will ever see! Boucher makes room and scoops him down to long-on and the ball appeared to be heading over the rope but Coetzer leapt up, stuck his right hand out and pulled off a stunner while falling backwards, he lands just before the rope, reminds me of Vasbert Drakes' catch in the 2003 World Cup
makes room and scoops a full delivery over long-on, makes batting look so easy
drops it a fraction shorter but it doesn't help as he gets on top of the bounce and carts it over deep midwicket
nice yorker, squeezed back to the bowler
full on middle and leg and he squeezes it past square leg, risks the second and he makes it before Smith whips off the bails
